theThief:StolenMomentum.NAME: Stolen Momentum
theThief:StolenMomentum.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Choose 1 card to discard.

theThief:StolenTechnique.NAME: Stolen Identity
theThief:StolenTechnique.DESCRIPTION: Add a random card to your hand from any color. NL It costs 0 this turn.
theThief:StolenTechnique.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random card to your hand from any color. NL It costs 0 this turn.

theThief:StolenChange.NAME: Stolen Change
theThief:StolenChange.DESCRIPTION: The next card you play this turn is refunded.
theThief:StolenChange.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next card you play this turn is refunded.

theThief:StolenTrap.NAME: Stolen Trap
theThief:StolenTrap.DESCRIPTION: Place a card in your hand on top of your draw pile. It cost 0 until it is played.
theThief:StolenTrap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Place a card in your hand on top of your draw pile. It cost 0 until it is played.

theThief:StolenChaos.NAME: Stolen Chaos
theThief:StolenChaos.DESCRIPTION: Play the top card of your draw pile and Exhaust it.
theThief:StolenChaos.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play the top card of your draw pile and Exhaust it.

theThief:StolenMastery.NAME: Stolen Mastery
theThief:StolenMastery.DESCRIPTION: Create a copy of an Attack or Power card in your hand.
theThief:StolenMastery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create 2 copies of an Attack or Power card in your hand.

theThief:StolenWeapon.NAME: Stolen Weapon
theThief:StolenWeapon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of your turn, lose !M! strength.

theThief:StolenArmor.NAME: Stolen Armor
theThief:StolenArmor.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade 1 card in your hand. NL Draw !M! Card, and gain !B! block if you draw an upgraded card.
theThief:StolenArmor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upgrade 1 card in your hand. NL Draw !M! Cards, and gain !B! block if you draw an upgraded card.

theThief:StolenTV.NAME: Stolen TV
theThief:StolenTV.DESCRIPTION: Add a random power to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.
theThief:StolenTV.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random power to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.

theThief:StolenMegaphone.NAME: Stolen Megaphone
theThief:StolenMegaphone.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! power you play this turn is played twice.
theThief:StolenMegaphone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next !M! powers you play this turn are played twice.

theThief:StolenCode.NAME: Stolen Code
theThief:StolenCode.DESCRIPTION: The first card you play next turn is played twice.
theThief:StolenCode.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first card you play next turn is played twice.

theThief:StolenShieldGenerator.NAME: Stolen Shield Generator
theThief:StolenShieldGenerator.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less Energy for each Power card played this combat. NL Gain !B! Block.
theThief:StolenShieldGenerator.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less Energy for each Power card played this combat. NL Gain !B! Block.

theThief:StolenShadow.NAME: Stolen Shadow
theThief:StolenShadow.DESCRIPTION: Reduce to cost of all cards in your deck by !M!.
theThief:StolenShadow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reduce to cost of all cards in your deck by !M!.

theThief:StolenArsenal.NAME: Stolen Arsenal
theThief:StolenArsenal.DESCRIPTION: Replace all your cards with Shivs. NL They lose Exhaust. NL Draw until your hand is full. NL Exhaust.
theThief:StolenArsenal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Replace all your cards with Shivs. NL They lose Exhaust. NL Draw until your hand is full. NL Exhaust.

theThief:StolenCore.NAME: Stolen Core
theThief:StolenCore.DESCRIPTION: Gain !theThief:Magic! Orb slots. NL Every time you play a card, channel !M! random Orb.
theThief:StolenCore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !theThief:Magic! Orb slots. NL Every time you play a card, channel !M! random Orbs.

theThief:stolenSpellScroll.NAME: Stolen Spell Scroll
theThief:stolenSpellScroll.DESCRIPTION: Play a random Spell and Exhaust it.

theThief:stolenArteScroll.NAME: Stolen Magical Weapon
theThief:stolenArteScroll.DESCRIPTION: Play a random Arte and Exhaust it.

theThief:stolenMysticalSpellbook.NAME: Mystical Spellbook
theThief:stolenMysticalSpellbook.DESCRIPTION: Discover !M! random Spell. NL It costs 0 this turn.
theThief:stolenMysticalSpellbook.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discover !M! random Spells. NL They costs 0 this turn.

theThief:stolenBoxOfWeapons.NAME: Stolen Box of Weapons
theThief:stolenBoxOfWeapons.DESCRIPTION: Discover !M! random Arte. NL It costs 0 this turn.
theThief:stolenBoxOfWeapons.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discover !M! random Artes. NL They costs 0 this turn.

theThief:stolenMagicCantrip.NAME: Stolen Magic Cantrip
theThief:stolenMagicCantrip.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Cantrip to your hand.
theThief:stolenMagicCantrip.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random upgraded Cantrip to your hand.

theThief:stolenMysticalOrb.NAME: Stolen Mystical Orb
theThief:stolenMysticalOrb.DESCRIPTION: Play a random Spell, then, a random Arte !M! times.
theThief:stolenMysticalOrb.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play a random Spell, then, a random Arte !M! times.

theThief:StolenFlute.NAME: Stolen Flute
theThief:StolenFlute.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
theThief:StolenFlute.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

theThief:StolenGreatHorn.NAME: Stolen Great Horn
theThief:StolenGreatHorn.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, bard:Queue !M! [WildNote] .
theThief:StolenGreatHorn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, bard:Queue !M! [WildNote] .

theThief:StolenMail.NAME: Stolen Mail
theThief:StolenMail.DESCRIPTION: Add the letters of admiration, love and respect to your hand, draw, and discard piles.
theThief:StolenMail.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add the letters of admiration, love and respect to your hand, draw, and discard piles.

theThief:StolenClock.NAME: Stolen Clock
theThief:StolenClock.DESCRIPTION: Add a thethief:pattern_shift to your hand. NL It cannot leave your hand.
theThief:StolenClock.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a thethief:pattern_shift to your hand. NL It cannot leave your hand.

theThief:StolenKnives.NAME: Stolen Knives
theThief:StolenKnives.DESCRIPTION: Gain 99 Knives. NL Whenever you play a card, throw !M! Knife that deals !D! damage and applies 1 Blight to a random enemy.
theThief:StolenKnives.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 99 Knives. NL Whenever you play a card, throw !M Knife that deals !D! damage and applies 1 Blight to a random enemy.
